extendedInfo.description: Fly over mountains, valleys, waterfalls, canyons, and caverns. Land your plane on aircraft carriers, airfields, and airports. Soar over the ranges, or dodge trees on the deck. Unlock new airfields, aircraft, missions and challenges!Flight Theory is a flight simulator that focuses on realism and fun. Tilt your device to control the airplane. Drag your finger across the screen to look around and take in the sights.Perform a perfect landing and top the leader board or just fly around for fun!Features:- Virtual 3D cockpits.- Dynamic skies. Choose your favorite time to fly - early morning, evening, or night? Choose a random time and watch the sun and moon cross the sky as you fly.- Land on aircraft carriers and airfields. - Detailed 3D terrain. Soar over mountains, valleys, trees, and rivers.- Unlockable airfields and missions. Completing one mission unlocks the next in the series. Each mission can be replayed with random start and end locations. - Online leaderboards and achievements. Each landing is scored by a number of factors. Line up perfectly, land gently, and you'll be rewarded with a great score!- Focus on realism and fun. Flight Theory simulates stalls, lift, drag, flaps, and more. - Free Flight mode. - World War 1 / World War 2 era aircraft and more.Flight Theory is a simulator in continuous development. Please send any suggestions for improvements, new planes, or features youâd like to see in future updates.Fasten your seat belt and put tray tables in their upright position. Flight Theory is quite a ride. Take off today!

reviews.title: Frustrating
reviews.comment: This would be a lot of fun. If I could land without crashing. Or take off without crashing. But I can\'t. So it\'s not fun. I\'d love to rate higher.
reviews.author: Andrew Beckner

reviews.title: Flight Theory
reviews.comment: Good game ruined by screen dimming all the time. Surely this is the first thing to override when building a game.
reviews.author: Steve Merry

reviews.title: Bad glitches
reviews.comment: My graphics are all distorted! Droid RAZR maxx HD
reviews.author: Zach Webb

reviews.title: Jason PLEASE help...
reviews.comment: UPDATE: Problem solved great game, flight SIM whatever....Jeff in Cleveland
reviews.author: Jeffery Mercer

reviews.title: Not working on S4 with Cyanogenmod
reviews.comment: So while I\'m refunding you\'ll get 3 stars for a nice intro movie.
reviews.author: Jeroen Wedda

reviews.title: Nice flight \'sim\'
reviews.comment: Nice production values and pretty good feel to the flight..would love some combat missions
reviews.author: Alan Hickling

reviews.title: Stuck on Volcano Run
reviews.comment: I really like this Sim but the waypoints on Volcano Run are really confusing it shows the waypoint under the runway by the Sea and I can\'t reach it? A little help would be nice no site to even get help with it other then that I like it alot.
reviews.author: Bob Morgret

reviews.title: Great Simulator!
reviews.comment: Really enjoying this. Great work dev :)
reviews.author: Miles Henderson

reviews.title: Needs improvement
reviews.comment: Not a fan of \"device tilting\" to steer and manuever aircraft. I\'d like the option of screen touch control for steering. Also, the inside views from the plane\'s cockpit isn\'t nearly as nice or detailed as in the screen shots advertised.
reviews.author: Anthony Davis
